significant_policies_disclosed: Property, plant and equipment at cost less depreciation (IAS 16)
Revenue recognition at point of delivery under IFRS 15
Inventories valued at lower of cost and net realizable value using weighted average method (IAS 2)
Deferred tax accounted for temporary differences (IAS 12)
Cash flow statement prepared under direct method (IAS 7)
Foreign currency transactions converted at spot rate (IAS 21)
Borrowing costs capitalized for qualifying assets (IAS 23)
Financial instruments measured at amortized cost (IFRS 9)
accounting_policies_review.ias_8_hierarchy_compliance: Compliant as per note 2.01 and 2.03; financial statements prepared in accordance with IFRSs and IAS 8 hierarchy. Changes in accounting policies disclosed as per note 2.06.

critical_judgments.management_assumption: Revenue recognized at point of delivery from factory when control transfers to customer.
critical_judgments.alternative_view: Revenue could be recognized earlier (e.g., upon shipment) or later (e.g., upon customer acceptance).
critical_judgments.frc_skeptical_assessment: Judgment appears reasonable given sales are on 100% confirmed L/C and delivery basis, as disclosed in note 2.11 and 5.00.
critical_judgments.impact_if_changed: Could shift revenue between accounting periods, affecting profit, receivables, and tax liabilities.

critical_judgments.management_assumption: No indication of impairment exists; assets reviewed for impairment under IAS 36.
critical_judgments.alternative_view: Potential impairment due to economic factors, technological obsolescence, or underutilization.
critical_judgments.frc_skeptical_assessment: Given capacity utilization of 70.24% (note 2.18.1) and going concern basis, management's judgment appears appropriate.
critical_judgments.impact_if_changed: Could lead to impairment losses reducing carrying value of PPE and profit.

critical_judgments.management_assumption: All accounts receivable considered good and fully secured by confirmed L/C; no provision required.
critical_judgments.alternative_view: Some receivables could be aged or uncollectible despite L/C security.
critical_judgments.frc_skeptical_assessment: Given 100% L/C security and aging analysis (note 5.00), judgment is reasonable but relies on bank creditworthiness.
critical_judgments.impact_if_changed: Provision would reduce receivables and profit.

key_estimation_uncertainties.estimate: Useful lives and residual values of Property, Plant and Equipment
key_estimation_uncertainties.reason_of_the_status: Depreciation rates are disclosed (note 2.08), but sensitivity of changes in useful lives or residual values is not quantified. Management uses historical experience and market practice.
key_estimation_uncertainties.status_reference: Note 2.08, Page 16; Key Audit Matter for PPE (Page 3-4)

key_estimation_uncertainties.estimate: Deferred tax liability (dependent on future profitability forecasts)
key_estimation_uncertainties.reason_of_the_status: Significant judgment involved in forecasting future taxable income over multiple years. Deferred tax calculation disclosed but sensitivity not provided.

key_estimation_uncertainties.estimate: Inventory valuation (lower of cost and net realizable value)
key_estimation_uncertainties.reason_of_the_status: Weighted average method used; NRV assessed but sensitivity to price changes not disclosed. Physical count and valuation procedures documented.

key_estimation_uncertainties.estimate: Provision for Workers Profit Participation Fund (WPPF)
key_estimation_uncertainties.reason_of_the_status: Provision calculated at 5% of net profit before tax as per labor law; estimation uncertainty relates to profit volatility.
